attributes.action: enforce the protection of all 999 staff eg police, fire, ambulance etc....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to do more to protect all 999 crew on the front line and to enforce tougher sentences for the minority that still abuse our hero's that are risking their own lives to protect others.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "enforce the protection of all 999 staff eg police, fire, ambulance etc..."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22559


Prime Minister's Office
